version_description:
- Fixed iPhone 6S and iPhone 6S+ touch issue.
- Dropped support for iOS7, mandatory as code base had to be upgraded to Swift 2.0.

- New: International transfers
- Fixed: Duplicate transactions in history
- Fixed: App splash screen displays logo as a black box
- Fixed: Amount displayed as 0 on review screen for amounts over 1000
Updated to new BML Internet Banking API. Previous versions of the app will not work any more. Please update to continue using the app.
Fixed crash on launch, and other improvements.
Fixed crash on Accounts where a customer does not have credit cards.
Many Accounts and Transfer related fixes and improvements.

- Bug fixes
- Added Face ID unlock
Transfer receipt message update and wheel fixes for iPhone 12.
